## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a1a249da7f5d65ac080890111e76921348e8eadbfca48a449be1319f9c65982c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'req-flask' @ 2.9.4 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
